verses.verse: And there was <S%H1961><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of mount <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2022><s%> Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Micah. <S%H4321><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto his mother, <S%H517><s%> The eleven hundred <S%H505><s%> <S%H3967><s%> shekels of silver <S%H3701><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were taken <S%H3947><s%> from thee, about which thou <S%H859><s%> cursedst, <S%H422><s%> and spakest <S%H559><s%> of also <S%H1571><s%> in mine ears, <S%H241><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> the silver <S%H3701><s%> is with <S%H854><s%> me; I <S%H589><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> it. And his mother <S%H517><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be thou of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> my son. <S%H1121><s%>

And when he had restored <S%H7725><s%> <S%H853><s%> the eleven hundred <S%H505><s%> <S%H3967><s%> shekels of silver <S%H3701><s%> to his mother, <S%H517><s%> his mother <S%H517><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> I had wholly dedicated <S%H6942><s%> <S%H6942><s%> <S%H853><s%> the silver <S%H3701><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> from my hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> for my son, <S%H1121><s%> to make <S%H6213><s%> a graven image <S%H6459><s%> and a molten image: <S%H4541><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> therefore I will restore <S%H7725><s%> it unto thee.

Yet he restored <S%H7725><s%> <S%H853><s%> the money <S%H3701><s%> unto his mother; <S%H517><s%> and his mother <S%H517><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> shekels of silver, <S%H3701><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> them to the founder, <S%H6884><s%> who made <S%H6213><s%> thereof a graven image <S%H6459><s%> and a molten image: <S%H4541><s%> and they were <S%H1961><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Micah. <S%H4321><s%>

And the man <S%H376><s%> Micah <S%H4318><s%> had a house <S%H1004><s%> of gods, <S%H430><s%> and made <S%H6213><s%> an ephod, <S%H646><s%> and teraphim, <S%H8655><s%> and consecrated <S%H4390><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3027><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of his sons, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> who became <S%H1961><s%> his priest. <S%H3548><s%>

In those <S%H1992><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> there was no <S%H369><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> in Israel, <S%H3478><s%> but every man <S%H376><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> that which was right <S%H3477><s%> in his own eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

And there was <S%H1961><s%> a young man <S%H5288><s%> out of Bethlehem-judah <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1035><s%> <S%H3063><s%> of the family <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4940><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> who <S%H1931><s%> was a Levite, <S%H3881><s%> and he <S%H1931><s%> sojourned <S%H1481><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

And the man <S%H376><s%> departed <S%H1980><s%> out of the city <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5892><s%> from Bethlehem-judah <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1035><s%> <S%H3063><s%> to sojourn <S%H1481><s%> where <S%H834><s%> he could find <S%H4672><s%> a place: and he came <S%H935><s%> to mount <S%H2022><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Micah, <S%H4318><s%> as he journeyed. <S%H6213><s%> <S%H1870><s%>

And Micah <S%H4318><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Whence <S%H4480><s%> <S%H370><s%> comest <S%H935><s%> thou? And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, I <S%H595><s%> am a Levite <S%H3881><s%> of Bethlehem-judah, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1035><s%> <S%H3063><s%> and I <S%H595><s%> go <S%H1980><s%> to sojourn <S%H1481><s%> where <S%H834><s%> I may find <S%H4672><s%> a place.

And Micah <S%H4318><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Dwell <S%H3427><s%> with <S%H5978><s%> me, and be <S%H1961><s%> unto me a father <S%H1><s%> and a priest, <S%H3548><s%> and I <S%H595><s%> will give <S%H5414><s%> thee ten <S%H6235><s%> shekels of silver <S%H3701><s%> by the year, <S%H3117><s%> and a suit <S%H6187><s%> of apparel, <S%H899><s%> and thy victuals. <S%H4241><s%> So the Levite <S%H3881><s%> went in. <S%H1980><s%>

And the Levite <S%H3881><s%> was content <S%H2974><s%> to dwell <S%H3427><s%> with <S%H854><s%> the man; <S%H376><s%> and the young man <S%H5288><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> unto him as one <S%H259><s%> of his sons. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%>

And Micah <S%H4318><s%> consecrated <S%H4390><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3027><s%> the Levite; <S%H3881><s%> and the young man <S%H5288><s%> became <S%H1961><s%> his priest, <S%H3548><s%> and was <S%H1961><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Micah. <S%H4318><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> Micah, <S%H4318><s%> Now <S%H6258><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> I that <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will do me good, <S%H3190><s%> seeing <S%H3588><s%> I have <S%H1961><s%> a Levite <S%H3881><s%> to my priest. <S%H3548><s%>
